259a5(1): sems bskyed cing yun ring po ci srid cig tu byang chub kyi dpyad pa 'byod/ lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin can zla bas bka' bathal pa/ rdorigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des meng bzod tha na
259a6(1): byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusem pa dang po bskyed do//  rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga/  par rdzog pa pa'i sangs rgyab rin ma rtse ma snying po la bal ba dang / 
259a7(1): bya rgyu dang / bakhyen pa'adzin rgya da gyung pa 'jug pa pa byad pa na mas na pa
259a8(1): dpa' chen po snying rjechen po dang ldan pa del 'jig gi pa dris la 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni can rna ba skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar yang de// rkye tog zlab mangs mangs drim myed pa di yang bskur zhing le
259a9(1): za zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltab sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs su'i 'jig rter gyi kham sa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'i dul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
259a10(1): kyang ldam ga thang chung te/ des dpyod kyis pam sa du stong rje nan po zhes bya dbyed rab tu thob pa men no// skyes bu ngam pa de'i phyir kyang ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa snyed rje nan po ldang ba'i phyis rnams
259b1(1): la snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'jugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal ba grangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra
259b2(1): rab kyi rdul snyed na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la yang dang yang du khyod kyis grags pa dang snyand pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// gang khyod kyis sems
259b3(1): can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po grangs myed pa dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par
259b4(1): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig smon las kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyis lung ba nyand pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
259b5(1): gang dag khyod kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug pa de dag thams ca dA kyang / phyis bskal pa grangs myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
259b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi nga dul tha rab kyi rdus snyed po ka' das tu sangs rgyan dan nyid pa cings kyi 'a'ajal batho na/ de dag khyong la brtsams so// mas/ bags pa nga par byu te/ phru ga sum pa des dbye
259b7(1): thangam pacud mems po zhes kyang rlos shig// yang de'i char du ba sems dpang drang phyung phrag dgu dang / bye ba thag kyis kyi 'atsun par tham la dpa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das pad
259b8(1): dam ni gshegs pa dgra bcos pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas can ma la snying po de sa bag pa dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen pazung bgyis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gangs yan lag gsus kyis me
259b9(1): za rjes mabya ba snying / rtse tog zlab mdag pangs dris byed pa 'di bskur ba'i skyes bungs pa de yang blta pa'i slang cu sang+yas r+b+ba ma dan rten de mthilanam pa// rinas kyi bu de ma me gshegapa pa'i me napa de
259b10(1): bka' sa yang ba/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab pa shes na deng yang de de bzhin gshegs pa ring tha ze'i phreng ba'i ting nge 'dzid kyi ni bstadad pa'i khyad pa 'jigs pa byed pa 'chas kyi nas grangs de mgyon ci
260a1(1): rigs kyi bu de nas rin ze che'i tog dang / zla ba'i tog gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen zla ba las bye tog tha ba mdon mdzes dri ba byed pa blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' drung byung thag dgu dang / rtse
260a2(1): phrag gnyis pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin cen bsacags pa nas 'phags nas 'di lta ste/ dper na glog bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che babachags pa de
260a3(1): nas myi snang bar gyur pa te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi skyed mos 'tshal da 'dir lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ga la ba der dong ste/ phyi nad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin
260a4(1): po che'i snying po'i zhabs mgo bos phyag 'tshal da te/ byang chub semasadapa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na bram ze
260a5(1): la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyis rba mo sbyar cing / bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub semasas dpa' de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
260a6(1): rin cen zla bas/ gang la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur ba'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni 'di yin pa lta snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs
260a7(1): te bram ze po bye tog phul nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rim cen zla bas khyod la/ skye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur ra te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba yang
260a8(1): spring ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar spros pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed grangs skyed pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams me tog zla ba mdog mdzes de
260a9(1): ba byed pa dag thogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag tog tu lpags pa dang / bram ze la me tog dag bsku ba dang / yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba spring ba yang ji ltar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sna phyogs su
260a10(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu bdun 'das pa re/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa gam gyis sgyings pa zhes bya zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis sgyings pa de na/ de bzhin
260b1(1): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig dag la theg pa
260b2(1): chen po'i gtam 'bas zhig dag go chos nyond to// 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ cig ni mo seng ge'i rdo rje tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems
260b3(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po la yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po bab par
260b4(1): gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du s+pha rad te/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu myed/ grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag nas/ 
260b5(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dang ga tu myed grangs myed pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog tu lnga/ gas pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe
260b6(1): ma nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba wa/ ga khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sa sa rgyas/ kyi zhing de na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can zhes bya ba yag yo6
260b7(1): de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po phul pa yangs pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'khor bzhi po dag la theg 'chil gsum gyis chos nyon to// de na byang chub sems dpa' bos
260b8(1): dpa' chen po rnam par sdang byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa seng ge ltar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang
260b9(1): po thul pa yangs pa'i rgyan la/ sa cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po bab pa ji las gyur da ces don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshen byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
260b10(1): kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa der 'jig rten gyi khams dung skyeg ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
261a1(1): bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig dag la/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos stond to// de na byang chub sems
261a2(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni myi g.yo'i gtan pa zhes bya/ cig shos ni shes rab 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
261a3(1): 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos shing mye tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyend ni gang lags zhes yongs su zhus pa'i bar du yang ji ltar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshe na 'og gi phyogs logs su
261a4(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i
261a5(1): 'jig rten pa dang bral ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing ba/ zhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum po dag gis chos nyond to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' ga
261a6(1): kha cig ni rnam par snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ cig shos ni rnam par sngang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i na seng gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas sangs
261a7(1): rgya bya zhing nyi 'drub 'das pa den/ 'jig rten gyi 'am sa mye tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhen yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing kye tog kun tu rgyas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang bad bye tos rab tu ba shes byas
261a8(1): sa rgya mam ldan 'das kyi bar du btsunas te/ maco' nga bdes la 'khor ban tho dag la reg pa gsum mam ma cad da // sangs rgya kyi'i de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe che pa gnyis shes pa dpa
261a9(1): can mo rang gis rnam par 'byed pas sul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ gcig ni byang chub sems dpa gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dpa' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes byar te/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de
261a10(1): sheshegs pa nas yang ldang ba dang bye tog rab rgyas la/ btsun bcom ldan 'das 'dis ted du mtsho na bi sa zhing bye ga ga chad rten pa 'dab par gyud pa'i sku'i gang lags/ rkyen gdulas sa/ zhes bus pa dang / debarje
261b1(1): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kye tog rab rgyas kyis bka' bathal da pa// rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'og ni phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi 'bum 'das pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams
261b2(1): yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang zhing yang dag par sto
261b3(1): pa'i smon lam gyi yul bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi yul dang / gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag mang po dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
261b4(1): tu lung tond to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhig cig yod pa des smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa'
261b5(1): sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa bshad pa dang / ji nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing sangs
261b6(1): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyangayongs su bzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ ka dgis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil kyis mnand cing rtsod
261b7(1): pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyod mongs pa can snyegs ma lnga dang ldan/ zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang / mtshams myed pa byed pa myi dge ba'i za ba'i bar dang / 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud tshig
261b8(1): pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de cig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yon to// thamams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lnga dang / mye dang / snga ma yin
261b9(1): dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos mchod par bya ba spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi sa de la mchod par bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ 
261b10(1): mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyand to// ga gi me sems can cen
262a1(1): po des bcom ldan 'das de'i yun sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lda ngas la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe// bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams sangs rgyas kyi nang gi rdul za
262a2(1): rab kyi rdul sted dag gis rten po dag nas brgyag tun mapa/ btunams kun tu btum mas gang 'duld pa dang / me tog gi che gyi bar dag kyang mngam par rab tu dga' bar gyur kyang de bu'i 'dul pa mang / 
262a3(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sang par bya ba dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi khyod pa nges par bstand par bya ba dang / 
262a4(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
262a5(1): la ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo bstanang pa pyong ba'i 'jigs pa myed pa chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gsheganyes pa des de lta bu'i cho 'phrul dag stond to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
262a6(1): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par rnam par 'khrug pa dang gzungs kyis yang dag dra ba rab tu dag
262a7(1): bar rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyigs ma lnga dang / ldan pa'i 'jig rten na nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa bdo zhing zhod pa'i dus
262a8(1): yongs su bzung zhing 'tshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang / 'grogs par gyur cing / sems kyi rgyud cig pa'idul pa'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i byang chub
262a9(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yun ring po ci srid cig nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed ning yun ring po ci srid cig tu byang chub kyi khyad pa khyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
262a10(1): sdang byed bye tog rab rgyas bka' bcal pa'o/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni nga gdod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
262b1(1): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo ba ha nang pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang
262b2(1): mnyand pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag tog der de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sdang
262b3(1): mdzad mye tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyod la dri bar mdzad de/ mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag kyang bskur zhing legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyed
262b4(1): ba nas/ snying rje chen po brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thos pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir
262b5(1): khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi ma rnams la yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i
262b6(1): rgyal mtshan legs par 'jugs par 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam/ rna pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskuld pa grangs myed pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing dus phra rab kyi rdub snyed na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ca
262b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang 'du khyod kyi snyanang dang grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bus
262b8(1): sreg pang ba grangs skyed pa/ tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung rgyab yang dag par 'an btsun pang bdud de rab tu bad nas/ com ldan 'das yus pa rnams kyang / zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs
262b9(1): byang tshubs sa byeng skyo ldog pas bkod par gyud te// de sa 'jig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pa nas smon lam kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkod pa dag yengs su 'azung ba das dang / 'drul ba'i sems can nasas
262b10(1): kyang snying rje'i 'od zeng deg gis kun tu bka' par gyur to// gang ngan kyad kyis blar byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzid gu cug nas lung bstan pa ma ma thos pa de dag kyang byis lung bstan/ 
263a1(1): bag par rdzus / ded pas pan kyang byas sa grangs myed pa/ dus rgyas kyi da zas kyis gags bya su di khyon gyi phru sa sa
263a2(1): bla rab kyi rdus med po gzhan du sangs rgyas nyid chos dang ldan pa mas kyi 'tshar la la skor panas/ khyod ni las bamams gang bsngags pa brjod par gyud te/ rgyug sum pa des dubyes dam ba 'in mo
263a3(1): zhes kyang smos shig/ yang de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsold to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
263a4(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying po de lta blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gang la lan gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing / mye tog zla ba mngon
263a5(1): mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag skur ba'i skyes bu dam pa de yang ba lta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchis lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bye tog rab rgyas
263a6(1): des bka' saHlad pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na khyed cag de la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying za de las ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo ba hand pa'i spyod pa'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i tra1
263a7(1): chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dgabar 'khrugs pa dang / gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam
263a8(1): bar 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad mye tog rab rgyas de las mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig/ 
263a9(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mye tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i tshul gyi skyed mos tshal du lhags te phyind pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ringan po che'i snying po ga la
263a10(1): der dong ngo // yang de'i tshe na thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag
263b1(1): gyur pa de'i rkye na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang de bzhin dge
263b2(1): gas pa rin pa che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ting nge 'dzind kyi stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i spyan snga
263b3(1): nas/ bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams lal mo sbyar te bsngags pa brjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa/ 'de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
263b4(1): mye tog rab rgyas kyis/ gang la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma byed pa 'di dag bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyi rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin lta snyam nas/ byang chub sems
263b5(1): dag de dag bcos ldan 'das kyi byung sa bya thugs te/ tham de me tog nub pa sangs dris byed pa sul nas smras pa/ skyes bu das pa de ba'i ga gshegs pa rnas par dang ba da bye tog rab rgyas kyi
263b6(1): khyod la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa 'di dag bskur zhing skyes bu dam pa khyod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis so zhes brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// me tog gang yin
263b7(1): ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing tong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu bab pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dge ba'i sgras rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun tu gang bar gyur da te/ 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / 
263b8(1): dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / sdang ba'i sgra dang / pha rol tu phyind pa'i sgra dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / byi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / mngon yar shes pa'i sgra dang / mngon par 'du byed byed pa'i sgra dang / skye ba myed pa'i sgra dang / 'gag pa byed
263b9(1): pa'i sgra dang / zhi ba'i sgra dang / nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang / rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / byams pa chen po'i sgra dang / snying rje chen po'i sgra dang / byi skye ba'i sgra dang / dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa'i sgra dang / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig
264a1(1): 'ad kyi sanas kyis de dag de du 'phrul kyis 'di ngas phyogs par dang ste/ di te dpong daskyes su slobs dang ldan pas lagapa brgyang ba'i bzhi 'byang bathos dpa da bya pas kyi
264a2(1): de sa nas 'ong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ya nga / rtog 'dir rtags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' do dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'bras ba rnam pa sngo tshogs dag gis da dgas de ban zhes
264a3(1): ba'i nathe che'i snying tho sa mchod pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan pa'i mtshon da la yang mchod pa byas mchos nyan pa'i phyir gnas lta bur thob par 'bod do// rtsigs kyi bu bdun dan 'dod kyi 'i
264a4(1): bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che zhi snying po de la mye tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma myed pa de dag gis mchi da pa byas te gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag tha na myed pa hraH
264a5(1): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand tu gsol// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po ting nge 'dzin glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ ting nge 'dzind des thams cad
264a6(1): dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du gnas par gyurd nas/ ri dang shing sngond pa rnams dang / rtswa dang / shing dang / sa gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo // 
264a7(1): sems can gang dag chos nyen pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yin la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kha cig ni ser po/ kha cig ni kar po/ kha cig ni bcod la/ kha cig ni dmar po/ kha cig ni nag zo/ 
264a8(1): kha cig ni skya bor gnas te/ kha cig ni lus kyi rlung lta bur kund tu snang / kha cig ni mye lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' lta bur/ kha cig ni smyig rgyu ba lta bur/ kha cig chu lta bur/ kha cig ni ri lta bur/ kha cig ni tshangs
264b1(1): ba lta byer/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bung / kha cig mi tog lta bur/ kha cig ni nam mkha' ldi bur/ kha ni seng ge lta bur/ 'a cig ni nyis lta bur/ kha cig ni zla ba sta bur/ kha cig mi skang sa lta zung / 'tshig
264b2(1): rgod lta bu dang / wa lta bu dag tu kun tu snang ste/ chos nyand pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su kun tu snang ngo // / rigs kyi bu de na sems can da
264b3(1): gis rang rang gi lus ji ltar mthong ba/ de ltar bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i sku yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu mdun na 'dond kyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun du
264b4(1): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ze ba la bzhugs par mthong // rigs kyi bu de na sems can gang dgas dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa 'am 'greng ba'i sems
264b5(1): can re rab kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa che'i snying ze snyir mthong bdag mi de bzhin gshegs pa ni na tha ze'i snying po'i kun pa na 'dug te zug sa thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag kris bu las bzlams
264b6(1): ze chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa rnams la sdang bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten las ldang bar byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so/ legs
264b7(1): 'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dpe red/ me tog gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig la kha dog snga tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / reg pa lnga tshogs dang / 'dabs sna tshogs dang / sdong bu sna tshogs dang / tha ba sna tshogs dang / smar
264b8(1): rgya mo byad kyi gnas snga rdzogs yod de/ de la me ton 'acig ni la dog dang dril ni dpag med brgyud/ khacig gis ni dpag gnyis bskyed/ 'acig gis de sum brgyur/ srung de ldan ner byed cing / de bzhin du gyur na ti na ma
264b9(1): tog la cig ni la dog dang / dris gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi zhabs thams cad du ljang de ldan ner byed la/ de ma sems can gang dag phyag myed pa de dag gis mye ton de'i dri bsnams na ni byig dag thob par gyur nga/ 'on
265a1(1): ba rnams kyis ne rna ba dag thob par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyis ni yan lag thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag nang bzhi brgya pa ran
265a2(1): po dag gis gtses par gyur pa de dag gis dri de bsnams pa ni/ nad thams cad las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur ba dang / de na sems can gang dag myos pa dang / brgyal ba dang / smyos pa dang / sems rmugs pa
265a3(1): dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / dran pa nyams pa rnams kyis mye tog de dag gi dri bsnams na ni/ dran pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ mye tog gi zhing de'i nang nas pad ma dkar po mkhrang ba/ 
265a4(1): sra ba rdo rje las grub pa 'jam pa/ sdong bu ni be rur+ya/ 'dab ma ni gser/ ze 'bru ni rdo'i snying po/ ze ba ni mu tig dmar po/ dbang du ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong / brgyar ni dpag tshad 'bum yod pa
265a5(1): cig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad ma dkar po de'i kha dog dang /  dris phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab cing / lnga de lha ner gyur da la
265a6(1): bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bye khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag na/ sems can gyi 'ams ga dag lus kyi mthun pa dang / nad kyis nye nad pa dang / san laganyisas
265a7(1): bA dang / byas pa dang / rgyas pa dang / nus pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / dran pa rab tu nyams pa dang / sems rnam par nyams pa g.yengs pa'i sems can de dag gis pad ma dkam ze rde'i 'od 'thong zhing / dri bcwa
265a8(1): pa na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / dran pa yang thob par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shi nas yun ring por ma lon zhing sus ma zhig pa de dag gi ro la pad ma dkar po dam
265a9(1): 'od zer dag gis thog gas dris reg na/ ri de dag srog gi dbang po thob par 'gyur zhing / yang phyir yangs te mdza' bshes dang stag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas de dag thams cad bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod
265a10(1): pa'i yon tan lnga po dag sbyor cing ldan pa za 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang de nas shi 'phos par gyur pa de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur ba de dag der tshed pag tu byed par 'gyur zhing / 
265b1(1): yun ring bor gnas par yang 'gyu ba dang / de nas shi 'bros nas kyang gzhan du skye bar phyi 'gyur ba nan yod pa bram ze mye tog gi zhing ji lta bur pog ced pa'i 'dun pa 'di yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o// ji
265b2(1): nyi ma 'char ba nye bar gnas pa'i dus na mye tog de dag la bye zhing rab tu rgyas par gyur pa nas lha re lba ner zhing / kha cig 'phang du dpag tshad brgyal/ kha cig gi 'bang du ni dpag tshad stong gi bar du gyur nas/ be rbas
265b3(1): can mang po dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa de ltar ni/ 'jig rten du sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa 'byung ba yin no// ji ltar nyi ma shar pa'i 'od zer dag gis mye tog de dag la phye
265b4(1): zhing lha de lha ner gyur dade nas/ nad sna tshogs kyis nye nad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar byed par gyur pa pa de ltar ni/ skyes bu dam pa nga 'jig rten du 'byung ster/ thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis sems
265b5(1): can rnams la khyab par mdzad cing / kha phye nas yang dang yang du se dmas can rnams bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag la mngon par sbyor bar mdzad pa dang / khyod kyang sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa
265b6(1): dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'a/ 6/ dzi nad tu bcug cing bcud de rab tu bkod nas pal phul ba de dgathams cad kyis nga'i drung du sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sangs su su bzung ste
265b7(1): kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung / kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhingarang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang de lung bstan
265b8(1): pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis pa'i mad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su bzung ba de dag gis ni 'dul ba'i sems can thams pa nag pa 'gyul ma pa/ dge ba'i ma bskyed pa dan yongs su
265b9(1): bzung bas na/ de'i phyir de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes myi bya ste/ de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i bya ba byed pa ma yin no// de dag ni snying rje chen pos sems dang sems las byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no// 
265b10(1): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su tshol ba ma yin te// gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs su dag pa de dag yongs su dag sa
266a1(1): dedad pas su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dang ded dgas yang bste sa padad de/ bdadag 'anasas da ma sa rgyas kyi napa 'i ma sa margyan ma dun
266a2(1): ya? byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni ye shes dang bsas pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yin no// ga dag ci snang bdag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas spangs pa dge ba'i dra ba dang 'grod pa par gyu pa/ bur byed napa dang spangs pa/ so
266a3(1): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar gyur cig// theg pa chen pos
266a4(1): yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang yongs su spangs pa theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gis chos nyo nad par gyur cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang
266a5(1): tshe ring por gyur te/ yun ring du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bas ba dag pa dang / 'dul sla ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa rnams la chos nyond par gyur da cig ce spu de lta bu'i debs pa'i
266a6(1): byang chub bem pa dpa' de dag ni das na ye shes dang bams pa la ma' bar gyur pa yang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po zhes kyang kyi bya'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/ can/ 
266a7(1): rin po che'i snying po des phyag brkyang ste/ sor mo lngas 'od zer 'a dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dag rab tu bkye'o// 'od zer de dag tshad myed grangs byed dpag tu myed pa'i phyogs su dong ste/ sangs
266a8(1): rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar byas nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams mthe' bo rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthel po can de na myi rnams ni tshe lo bcu pa mdog ngan pa myi bsdug pa/ myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrum
266a9(1): them tha' ba'i chad tsas po// de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyar mi la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku thun yang bzod pa'i dus kyi ched kyi phye rnams kyi lu das
266a10(1): dang / mthe' bo tsam gyi myi rnams kyi khru gang song bdun gyi tshad ces te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te/ mtsho zhing bzhes la 'khor bzhi po rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gi chos nyond to// rigs kyi bu de nas thams
266b1(1): ci dang ldan pa'i 'a'od des sanges rgyas kyi ni pa de dang pyi dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa de sa thong das/ de bzhin gzhugs par gra pa yang dag par rdzogapa pa'i sangs rgyas zang bze spang bas paka yangs/ 
266b2(1): gshegs pa skar ma la dka' ba des na bska sad pa dpag tu myed grangs myed pa 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gtugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang po bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
266b3(1): chub tu sems bskyed do// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing / bcud de rab tu bkod do// sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs/ 
266b4(1): pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar/ bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab te/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su bzung ngo // kha cig gis ni
266b5(1): yongs su ma dag pa'i snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag yongs su bzung ngo // de na sems can chen po des nga yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas
266b6(1): bar byas nas/ der ngas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gtugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par bla na byed pa yang dag
266b7(1): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang nga le legs so zhes phyir khri byin nas ngal bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lug
266b8(1): bstan to// de na gang gis dbyang chub yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug pa'i dge ba'i bshes skyes bu dam pa des snyigs ma lnga gi nang tu bdo zhing nyon mongs pa dang / thong ba'i dus la ban bu'i dri/ shin da nyon mongs pa'i sang / 
266b9(1): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can mtshams byed pa byed pa dang / phyi dge ba'i rtsa pa dang ldan pa dang / sems kyi rgyud cig pa dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dkon pa nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag smon las kyis yongs
266b10(1): su bzung nas/ skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te mtsho zhing bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang legs so zhes po
267a1(1): btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar mying btags pa// nga'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen par bar yadad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rdzu byed na pa/ dris
267a2(1): 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can du mthe' bo'i tshad tsam gyi myi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lond te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tsha sum kyis kyi de dag nyid kyi khru gsum rgya
267a3(1): tshad tsam gyis skye dgu che lo bcu pa rnams la chos rnams ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// des dang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bcud de rab tu brko dpa
267a4(1): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la de dag gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir pho nye dag btang ngo // des dang
267a5(1): bo gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol pa tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzind tu bcug cing btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa bzo zhing rjes su dgo ngas pa de dag d+yan du
267a6(1): gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de la mye tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dngab dag na sems can tshe ring ga bsam la mangs su dag pa bde bar
267a7(1): gnas pa rnams pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams de bzhin pa/ shegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu na pa snyigs su lnga dang ldan de lta bur sangs rgyab nyid thob nas
267a8(1): sems can 'tshams myed pa byed pa dang / gyi dge ba'i za ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyu dad pa' brda dag la de shung rgyas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bang po lhag par mdzad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma spangs par chos stond pa
267a9(1): lto ma// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis kyang de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing shi nad tu den cing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par mtshams myed pa byed pa dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing sngon
267a10(1): sam khyad par can btab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad ni lad kyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas yongs su spangs pa dang / nyan thos dang / 
267b1(1): rang sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam bzhi nang du rtul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba dag yongs su bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni mye tog lta bu zhes bya ste/ 
267b2(1): gang dag shi nang tu dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nang du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ba de dag ni pad ma dkar po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtswa yin no// bram ze byang chub sems dpa
267b3(1): rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par smond pa dang / sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smond pa dang byang chub
267b4(1): thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam myi stond par spro med pa dang / byang chub thob nas tshe ring bar smond pa ste/ bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang
267b5(1): chub sems dpa' mye tog lta bu rnams shes bya'i/ pad mo dkar po lta/ khu yang ma yin la sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya ste/ bram d+ha ze 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs
267b6(1): par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas dkrugs pa rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i rigs kyi bu kha cig kyang yongs
267b7(1): chu bzung ba lta tsu'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi martson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngas pon man po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi ga zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs sus dan pa rnam se sa/ sangs rgyas kyis dza pabyed par na tha
267b8(1): spo nang pa dang / byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi thes pa'i gtam stonang par smond pa dang / byang chub thob nas/ che gcang yang myi ring gcang yang kyi lung zhing bar mar bsgrub par smond pa ste bzhi po 'di dang
267b9(1): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' pad ma dkar po lta bu rnams shes bya ba'i me tog lta bu rnams shes bya ste// byang chub
267b10(1): sems dpa' de dag ni sems dpa' chen po rnams shes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na khyod ni da ltar smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu byed/ grangs myed pa na/

272a4(1): dang bral zhing bkres pa dang skom pasla gyur da pa rnams dang / tha na gnod sbyin dbul po rnams am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gang dag tha na chos gos ngur smyig sor bzhi tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag
272a5(1): thams cad kyang bza' ba dang btung ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhing bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyu rang cig/ lha 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po/ 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi/ tra d+ya
272a6(1): 'am ji 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bu ma 'am/ sha za 'am/ dmyi 'am/ sems can gang dag phan tshun zhe 'gras shing khon gcu nas mang por gyurang ba rnams dang / phan tshun 'gyed cing
272a7(1): g.yul ngor zhugs te g.yul sprod par gyur pa rnams kyis kyang bdagra go chos gos dur smrig rjes su dran par gyur na sems can de dag snying rje'i sems dang 'jam pa'i sems dang / khon myed pa'i
272a8(1): sems dang / lus su rung ba'i sems su gyur da cig/ sems can gang dag g.yul po 'am 'gyed pa 'am/ 'thab pa 'am// bzod pa'i nang du bsrung ba dang / mchod par bgyi ba dang / gus par bgyi ba'i slad du ngur

272b5(1): chen po dang ldan pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' saHla da pa/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi smon lam ni dge ba bzang po rab tu gtan la bab/ pa yin te/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod ni

272b7(1): ba do/ de bzhin gshegs pas bsod nams kyi phyag sor ring pos yongs su bkab cing phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing sh+tsa kU l+yA A k+ShakrAk+Sh+Na/ gzhon pa'i mthil byugs pa dang / lung bstand cing legs so zhes bya ba byin pa des

273a1(1): bya ste bzhi pa'o// // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas

273a6(1): nub pa dang badrin zas 'di brgyad pa lags// kyegs kyi bu de/ de bzhi gshegs pa dag btsam pa yang dag par thugs pa'i sa rgyam rid pa che snying bas byang chub shesas dpa le sa dpa' che cacan
273a7(1): TI 'i chen po dang ldan pades 'di skad ces bka' sa to// snying rje chen po dang ldan bakhyod kyi zhu ba bzung ze babs pa dge te/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa spyod de ltar de bzhin gsheg pa pa la do des bu song kusun
273a8(1): da zhe ni/ badzin papa 'dres pa thugs pa med/  bye zu tu zhes zla tha'i te brjed kya / den kya 'dzid ba kyas rgya yi sa sa byedapa/ 
273b1(1): byed do// zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ne/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'di nang par byed do// chos pam sad pas bangon tha 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzi kyi pa ni/ ting
273b2(1): thams cad khongs su chud par byed do// phyag rgya rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gtsug rnam par lta bar byed do// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par song ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ byang
273b3(1): chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par nges par byed par 'gro bar byed do// nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed do// rdo rje'i ting nge
273b4(1): 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad ni myi phyed par byed do// chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la phyag rgya 'debs par byed do// ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyal po shi nang tu brtan pa'i
273b5(1): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzinang thams cad la rgyal po nyid rab tu/ gnas par byed do// 'od zer 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/  nge 'dzin da la 'od zer 'gyed par byed do// stobs kyi brtson 'bru tsa rtsa
273b6(1): kyi ting nge 'dzidad kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la stobs dang brtson 'grus su byed do// yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la gyen tu 'phags par byed do// nges pa'i tshig
273b7(1): stond pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyis tshig la 'jug pa la 'jug par byed do// tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind kyi snying gi rjes su 'dug par byed do// phyogs sa nas
273b8(1): bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rnam par lta bar byed do// chos thams cad la rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba rjes su rtog par byed po/ kug rgya yongs pa
273b9(1): 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dzind par byed do// chos thams cad la dben pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad las dben pa'i chos nyid la rjes su 'jug par byed do// brjed
274a1(1): thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad sdud cing yang dag par 'dre bar byed do// chos thams cad la rlom sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams/ 
274a2(1): la 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i rlom sems myed par byed do// nam mkha' khyab par byed pa'i ting 'dzin dkyis ni/ tipa 'dzin thams cad la nam mkha' ltar khyab par byed do// chos thams cad rgyun gyi gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin
274a3(1): kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad rgyun myi gcod par byed do// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzind par byed do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis
274a4(1): ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi bcud 'dzind par byed do// rin dace na rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ yo byad kyi nyon mo nges pa thams cad spong bar byed do// chos thams cad skye ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin
274a5(1): kyis ni/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang 'gag pa myed par ston da par byed do// rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis/ ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad ldam me ldan ne ljang nger byed do// chos thams cadad+ya d+ya
274a6(1): 'gag pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad rnam par 'byed par byed do// tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ tong nge 'dzind thams cad la ting nge 'dzind kyi chos rnams nam yang tshol bar myi byed do// 
274a7(1): gnas la brtend pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la gnas pa'i chos nam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar byed do// nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dkyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind kyis thams cad
274a8(1): nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur snying po myed pa nyid du yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed do// sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzi nad thams cad la sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams spong bar byed
274a9(1): ro// gzugs mu myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ gzugs kun tu snang bar byed do// dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la sgron ma bzhin du byed de// chos thams cad mu myed ste
274b1(1): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la ye shes bu myed par stond par byed do// blog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byas ni/ ting nge 'dzinang thams cad la shes pa su byed par byed do// 'od bams cad byed pa'o
274b2(1): nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad la 'od byed pa'i sgo nye bar nyond par byed do// khams kyi mtha'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzinang mtha' byed pa thams cad rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir nye zab stond par/ 
274b3(1): byed do// ting nge 'dzin dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind kyi chos rnams la stond pa nyid rjes su thob par byed do// lhun po rnam par bkra ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad gsog
274b4(1): nyid du kun tu stond par byed do// 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzi nad kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad dri ma myed par selang par byed do// chos thams cad brda'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad
274b5(1): ma 'dres pa nyid du yang dag par stond par byed do// dgal/ ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind tham/ sa cad la dga' ba rab tu thob par byed do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la rnam pa
274b6(1): che ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'o dra nyid myi dmyigs pa stond par byed do// zlog lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni ting nge 'dzind thams cad la myi zad pa nyid bstond par byed do// 
274b7(1): chos thams cad rnam par g.yeng ba byed cing rdul dang bral bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi shes pa rdul dang bral ba nye bar stond par byed do// myi zad pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dkyis ni

274b10(1): dang / nyams pa myed pa bstond par byed do// myi g.yo' ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la g.yo bar myi byed 'gul bar gyi byed do// rnam par 'phel ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin la
275a1(1): par byed do// zla ba dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang bar byed do// snang ba dgang pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin du thams cad la ma tsha yang dag par bzhwa pa pa ni brin par byed/ 
275a2(1): ro// bya ba dang myi bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ bya ba dang myi bya ba'i bya ba byed cing ye shes rtog kyang yang dag par dag par byed do// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad nges par 'byed par byed cing / gangal 'byor
275a3(1): pa yang dag par rjes su mye mthong bar sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis sems g.yo' bar myi byed 'gul bar myi byed cing / gnod par 'gyur ba yang myed la/ de 'di snyam du 'di ni sems yin no// snyam du yang myi sems
275a4(1): par byed do// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snang ba yang dag par rjes su mthong bar byed// rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad rab tu gnas pa

275a7(1): dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad la dga' ba spong bar byed do// chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad yi ge myi mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin

275b2(1): lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni chos thams cad rtogs par byed do// dran pa rnam par 'phrog pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad la spobs pa grangs myed pa thob par byed do// de byed pa'i shes rnam par dag pa'i
275b3(1): ting nge 'dzind kyis ni/ chos thams cad rnam par gcad pa yang da dag par rjes su mthong zar she na de// chos thams cad la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par byed do// ye shes tog gi ting nge 'dzin kyis
